caster:DeprecatedSandstorm.NAME: Sandstorm
caster:DeprecatedSandstorm.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength for 1 turn and gain 1 caster:Mired. NL Lose !caster:M2! Focus until the end of next turn.

caster:DeprecatedGigaDrain.NAME: Giga Drain
caster:DeprecatedGigaDrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to 25% of unblocked damage dealt.

caster:DeprecatedDiamondDust.NAME: Diamond Dust
caster:DeprecatedDiamondDust.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

caster:DeprecatedRamuh.NAME: Ramuh
caster:DeprecatedRamuh.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you caster:Electrify a card, reduce its cost by 1 for the turn.
caster:DeprecatedRamuh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you caster:Electrify a card, reduce its cost by 1 for the turn.

caster:DeprecatedHeatRay.NAME: Heat Ray
caster:DeprecatedHeatRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Decrease this card's damage by !M! this combat.

caster:DeprecatedShortenedChant.NAME: Shortened Chant
caster:DeprecatedShortenedChant.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the caster:Cast_Time of your Spells by !M!.

caster:DeprecatedSpontaneousCombustion.NAME: Spontaneous Combustion
caster:DeprecatedSpontaneousCombustion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !caster:D! damage. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times to the enemy with the lowest HP.

caster:DeprecatedFissure.NAME: Fissure
caster:DeprecatedFissure.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Stun to ALL enemies. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:DeprecatedFlashSpeed.NAME: Flash Speed
caster:DeprecatedFlashSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain !B! Block. NL caster:Electrify !caster:M2! random card in your hand.

caster:DeprecatedSleet.NAME: Sleet
caster:DeprecatedSleet.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card and gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

caster:DeprecatedMagicScroll.NAME: Magic Scroll
caster:DeprecatedMagicScroll.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card, reduce the Cast Time of any Spells drawn this way by !caster:M2! for this turn.

caster:DeprecatedMegaloSpark.NAME: Megalo Spark
caster:DeprecatedMegaloSpark.DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !M! random card in your hand. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies twice.
caster:DeprecatedMegaloSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: caster:Electrify !M! card in your hand. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage to ALL enemies twice.

caster:DeprecatedDivertFocus.NAME: Divert Focus
caster:DeprecatedDivertFocus.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! Focus until the end of next turn.

caster:DeprecatedBookThrow.NAME: Book Throw
caster:DeprecatedBookThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength for the rest of this turn.

caster:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
caster:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the caster:Cast_Time of a random Spell in your hand by 1.
caster:Incantation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, reduce the caster:Cast_Time of 2 random Spells in your hand by 1.

caster:QuickCast.NAME: Quick Cast
caster:QuickCast.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the caster:Cast_Time of a random spell in your hand by !M! until it's played.
caster:QuickCast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the caster:Cast_Time of a spell in your hand by !M! until it's played.

caster:BloodRitual.NAME: Blood Ritual
caster:BloodRitual.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Decrease the caster:Cast_Time of all your currently casted Spells by !caster:M2! NL Exhaust.

caster:Rectify.NAME: Rectify
caster:Rectify.DESCRIPTION: Choose an element, get a random Spell of that element. NL Exhaust.
caster:Rectify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an element, get a random Spell of that element, it costs 0 for this turn. NL Exhaust.

caster:IcicleLance.NAME: Icicle Lance
caster:IcicleLance.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Remove all Block from the enemy, then deal !caster:D! damage twice.

caster:Unearth.NAME: Unearth
caster:Unearth.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! Spell from your draw pile, then restore HP equal to its energy cost. NL Exhaust.
caster:Unearth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! Spell from your draw pile, then restore HP equal to double its energy cost. NL Exhaust.

caster:Elementalize.NAME: Elementalize
caster:Elementalize.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Spell in your hand. NL Gain [E] for every Spell in your hand with the same Element.

caster:Heavy.NAME: Heavy
caster:Heavy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !caster:B! Block. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the damage you blocked last turn. NL Cannot be Upgraded.

caster:MeteorStorm.NAME: Meteor Storm
caster:MeteorStorm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! zero cost Meteors into your draw pile.

caster:ManaOverflow.NAME: Mana Overflow
caster:ManaOverflow.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an elemental Spell add a *Soul *Strike to your hand.
caster:ManaOverflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play an elemental Spell add a *Soul *Strike to your hand.

caster:Fira.NAME: Fira
caster:Fira.DESCRIPTION: Deals !M! additional damage for every turn you've been in combat. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Cannot be Upgraded.

caster:MagicWeapon.NAME: Magic Weapon
caster:MagicWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards, discard all non-Spells drawn this way.

caster:MagicAttunement.NAME: Magic Attunement
caster:MagicAttunement.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Soul *Strike to your hand.

caster:SoulStrike.NAME: Soul Strike
caster:SoulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage. NL Exhaust.

caster:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
caster:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each Spell currently being casted. NL Currently: gain !B! Block.

caster:NaturalChaos.NAME: Natural Chaos
caster:NaturalChaos.DESCRIPTION: caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Apply !M! caster:Mired to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

caster:GaiasBlessing.NAME: Gaia's Blessing
caster:GaiasBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

caster:AshesToAshes.NAME: Ashes to Ashes
caster:AshesToAshes.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to the number of cards in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

caster:FlashFrost.NAME: Flash Frost
caster:FlashFrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! caster:Frost. NL Exhaust.

caster:FreezeInHell.NAME: Freeze In Hell
caster:FreezeInHell.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Apply !M! caster:Frost to ALL enemies.

caster:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
caster:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has caster:Frost deal !D! damage !M! more times.

caster:Thundara.NAME: Thundara
caster:Thundara.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random Spell in your hand to 0 this turn. NL caster:Cast_Time !caster:Delay!: NL Deal !caster:D! damage !M! times. NL Cannot be Upgraded.

caster:Channeling.NAME: Channeling
caster:Channeling.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you've played a Spell this turn: Gain !M! additional Block.

caster:Ashes.NAME: Ashes
caster:Ashes.DESCRIPTION: Exhausts when drawn, add a random card into your hand.

caster:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
caster:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: caster:Burn !M! card in your hand. NL Apply caster:Blazed equal to !caster:M2! times its cost.
